criteria.name: answer_completeness
criteria.description: The response is complete: all the aspects of the reference answer are addressed in the response. The response might use different phrasing or wording from the reference answer.

options.name: Excellent
options.description: The response addresses all aspects of the reference answer.

options.name: Good
options.description: The response addresses most aspects of the reference answer, with minor omissions.

options.name: mediocre
options.description: The response covers the essential aspects of the reference answer but has notable omissions.

options.name: Bad
options.description: The response covers only a few aspects of the reference answer, with significant omissions.

options.name: Very Bad
options.description: The response fails to address the reference answer meaningfully, with most aspects omitted.
